title: Chile
creator_credit: Erle K. James and ERPI Classroom Films
brief_description: Calls attention to varied aspects of the Chilean scene - mountains, deserts, glaciers, mines, ports, and pastoral area - before proceeding to an estate in the agricultural Central Valley.
